attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dihydrogen monoxide is colorless, odorless, it kills thousands of people every year
Most of these deaths are caused by inhalation of DHMO
DHMO ingestion can cause excessive urination, nausea, vomiting and electrolyte 
imbalance. For those who have become dependent, DHMO withdrawal means certain death

Dihydrogen monoxide is also known as hydroxl acid, it is the major component of acid rain.
It can cause severe burns.
It erodes our natural landscape.
It accelerates corrosion of many metals.
It decreases effectiveness of automobile brakes.
Is found in tumors of terminal cancer patients. 

Dihydrogen monoxide has been found in most rivers in the UK
It has even been found in Antarctic ice

Despite the danger, dihydrogen monoxide is used - in nuclear power plants - in the production of styrofoam - as a fire retardant - in the distribution of pesticides - as an additive in most "junk-foods"

Companies dump waste DHMO into watercourses, this practice is still legal

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
